item.description:
For 12 years Canadians have been enjoying comraderie, conversations and coffee at the Porter Airlines Team Canada Brunch. You do not have to be a runner racing the Boston Marathon the next day, but we encourage you to wear red and carbo-load with fellow Canucks!

Registration in advance is encouraged as several seatings usually Sell Out. www.bostonteaparty.ca

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Team Canada Brunch @ the Boston Marathon
